mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RN, A.* FROM (SELECT f.*,u.userName,u.userProfileImage FROM FUNDINGGOODSCOMMENTS f,USERS u WHERE u.userId=f.userId AND f.fundingCode=#{fundingCode} ORDER BY f.FGCOMMENTSDATE DESC) A) WHERE RN BETWEEN #{startRow} AND #{endRow}
SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RN, A.* FROM (SELECT count(*) FROM FUNDINGGOODSCOMMENTS f,users u WHERE u.userid=f.userid and f.fundingcode=#{fundingCode} ORDER BY f.FGCOMMENTSDATE DESC) A)
SELECT FGC.*,U.USERNAME, U.USERPROFILEIMAGE FROM FundingGoodsComments FGC, USERS U WHERE FGC.FGCOMMENTSNUMBER=#{fgCommentsNumber} AND U.USERID=FGC.USERID
mapper.update: UPDATE fundinggoodscomments SET fgcommentsreplycount = fgcommentsreplycount+1 WHERE fgcommentsnumber=#{fgCommentsNumber}
